topic.title: LAK SFR CNC: Run Flow and Transport models

para.text: LAK SFR CNC: Run Flow and Transport models

Next run the model. The input for both the flow and transport models will be exported at the same time. The flow and transport models will run in different simulations so ModelMonitor will run twice, once for the flow model and again for the transport model.

image.caption: Screen capture of ModelMonitor running the flow model.

image.title: Screen capture of ModelMonitor running the transport model.
image.caption: Screen capture of ModelMonitor running the transport model.
